rows.label: bf08120100_0010
rows.name:
I don't see what good
knowing would do.

rows.label: bf08120100_0030
rows.name: The Kagutsuchi I knew isn't you.

rows.label: bf08120100_0040
rows.name: I can only think of you as a completely different Blade.

rows.label: bf08120100_0050
rows.name:
Makes sense.
I have nothing to say when you put it like that.

rows.label: bf08120100_0060
rows.name: But I still want to know.

rows.label: bf08120100_0070
rows.name: What I did before, what I thought...

rows.label: bf08120100_0080
rows.name:
And... I don't want to forget the people
who were important to me.

rows.label: bf08120100_0120
rows.name:
Hana was just born
So I don't understand well...

rows.label: bf08120100_0130
rows.name:
but for any Blade, memories of their Driver
are very precious!

rows.label: bf08120100_0140
rows.name: The most important thing of all!

rows.label: bf08120100_0150
rows.name: Hana wants to make many memories with Masterpon too!

rows.label: bf08120100_0160
rows.name: That's what Hana thinks about every day!
